Fischler Catch-PER
had OUT
proposed OUT
banning OUT
sheep OUT
brains OUT
, OUT
spleens OUT
and OUT
spinal OUT
cords OUT
from OUT
the OUT
human OUT
and OUT
animal OUT
food OUT
chains OUT
after OUT
reports OUT
from OUT
Britain Catch-LOC
and OUT
France Catch-LOC
that OUT
under OUT
laboratory OUT
conditions OUT
sheep OUT
could OUT
contract OUT
Bovine Fusion
Spongiform Fusion
Encephalopathy Catch-MISC
( OUT
BSE Catch-MISC
) OUT
-- OUT
mad OUT
cow OUT
disease OUT
. OUT

But OUT
some OUT
members OUT
of OUT
the OUT
EU Catch-ORG
's OUT
standing OUT
veterinary OUT
committee OUT
questioned OUT
whether OUT
the OUT
action OUT
was OUT
necessary OUT
given OUT
the OUT
slight OUT
risk OUT
to OUT
human OUT
health OUT
. OUT

The OUT
question OUT
is OUT
being OUT
studied OUT
separately OUT
by OUT
two OUT
EU Catch-ORG
scientific OUT
committees OUT
. OUT

Sheep OUT
have OUT
long OUT
been OUT
known OUT
to OUT
contract OUT
scrapie OUT
, OUT
a OUT
similar OUT
brain-wasting OUT
disease OUT
to OUT
BSE Catch-MISC
which OUT
is OUT
believed OUT
to OUT
have OUT
been OUT
transferred OUT
to OUT
cattle OUT
through OUT
feed OUT
containing OUT
animal OUT
waste OUT
. OUT

British Catch-MISC
officials OUT
say OUT
sheep OUT
meat OUT
is OUT
perfectly OUT
safe OUT
to OUT
eat OUT
. OUT

ZDF Catch-ORG
said OUT
Germany Catch-LOC
imported OUT
47,600 OUT
sheep OUT
from OUT
Britain Catch-LOC
last OUT
year OUT
, OUT
nearly OUT
half OUT
of OUT
total OUT
imports OUT
. OUT

It OUT
brought OUT
in OUT
4,275 OUT
tonnes OUT
of OUT
British Catch-MISC
mutton OUT
, OUT
some OUT
10 OUT
percent OUT
of OUT
overall OUT
imports OUT
. OUT

After OUT
the OUT
British Catch-MISC
government OUT
admitted OUT
a OUT
possible OUT
link OUT
between OUT
mad OUT
cow OUT
disease OUT
and OUT
its OUT
fatal OUT
human OUT
equivalent OUT
, OUT
the OUT
EU Catch-ORG
imposed OUT
a OUT
worldwide OUT
ban OUT
on OUT
British Catch-MISC
beef OUT
exports OUT
. OUT

. OUT

's OUT

. OUT

said OUT

Garlic OUT
pills OUT
do OUT
n't OUT
lower OUT

, OUT
study OUT
finds OUT
. OUT

LONDON Catch-LOC
1996-08-22 OUT

Garlic OUT
pills OUT
may OUT
not OUT
lower OUT
blood OUT
cholesterol OUT
and OUT
studies OUT
that OUT
show OUT
they OUT
do OUT
may OUT
be OUT
flawed OUT
, OUT
British Catch-MISC
researchers OUT
have OUT
reported OUT
. OUT

A OUT
study OUT
by OUT
a OUT
team OUT
of OUT
doctors OUT
at OUT
Oxford Fusion
University Catch-ORG
has OUT
found OUT
people OUT
with OUT
high OUT
blood OUT
cholesterol OUT
do OUT
not OUT
benefit OUT
significantly OUT
from OUT
taking OUT
garlic OUT
tablets OUT
. OUT

The OUT
study OUT
involved OUT
115 OUT
people OUT
with OUT
high OUT
blood OUT
cholesterol OUT
levels OUT
. OUT

They OUT
were OUT
given OUT
900 OUT
milligrams OUT
a OUT
day OUT
of OUT
dried OUT
garlic OUT
powder OUT
or OUT
placebo OUT
tablets OUT
. OUT
" OUT

There OUT
were OUT
no OUT
significant OUT
differences OUT
between OUT
the OUT
groups OUT
receiving OUT
garlic OUT
and OUT
placebo OUT
, OUT
" OUT
they OUT
wrote OUT
in OUT
the OUT
Journal Fusion
of Fusion
the Fusion
Royal Fusion
College Fusion
of Fusion
Physicians Catch-ORG
. OUT

Those OUT
taking OUT
part OUT
were OUT
told OUT
to OUT
eat OUT
a OUT
low-fat OUT
diet OUT
for OUT
six OUT
weeks OUT
before OUT
they OUT
started OUT
taking OUT
the OUT
pills OUT
, OUT
and OUT
their OUT
blood OUT
cholesterol OUT
measured OUT
before OUT
and OUT
after OUT
the OUT
six-week OUT
period OUT
. OUT

The OUT
researchers OUT
said OUT
this OUT
would OUT
make OUT
their OUT
findings OUT
more OUT
accurate OUT
. OUT

Several OUT
studies OUT
have OUT
found OUT
garlic OUT
pills OUT
can OUT
lower OUT
blood OUT
pressure OUT
and OUT
blood OUT
cholesterol OUT
. OUT

But OUT
the OUT
Oxford Catch-LOC
team OUT
disputed OUT
these OUT
findings OUT
and OUT
said OUT
either OUT
previous OUT
trials OUT
may OUT
have OUT
been OUT
interpreted OUT
incorrectly OUT
, OUT
those OUT
taking OUT
part OUT
were OUT
not OUT
given OUT
special OUT
diets OUT
beforehand OUT
or OUT
the OUT
duration OUT
of OUT
the OUT
studies OUT
may OUT
have OUT
been OUT
too OUT
short OUT
. OUT

The OUT
six-month OUT
trial OUT
was OUT
funded OUT
by OUT
the OUT
British Fusion
Heart Fusion
Foundation Catch-ORG
and OUT
Lichtwer Fusion
Pharma Fusion
GmbH Catch-ORG
, OUT
which OUT
makes OUT
Kwai Catch-MISC

garlic OUT

. OUT

The OUT
study OUT

not OUT
address OUT
whether OUT
whole OUT
garlic OUT
could OUT
affect OUT
cholesterol OUT
. OUT

Ukraine Catch-LOC
hails OUT
peace OUT
as OUT
marks OUT
five-year OUT
independence OUT
. OUT

Rostislav Fusion
Khotin Catch-PER

KIEV Catch-LOC
1996-08-23 OUT

Ukraine Catch-LOC
celebrates OUT
five OUT
years OUT
of OUT
independence OUT
from OUT
Kremlin Catch-LOC
rule OUT
on OUT
Saturday OUT
, OUT
hailing OUT
civil OUT
and OUT
inter-ethnic OUT
peace OUT
as OUT
its OUT
main OUT
post-Soviet Catch-MISC
achievement OUT
. OUT

Ukraine Catch-LOC
's OUT
declaration OUT
of OUT
independence OUT
in OUT
1991 OUT
, OUT
backed OUT
nine-to-one OUT
by OUT
a OUT
referendum OUT
in OUT
December OUT
of OUT
that OUT
year OUT
, OUT
effectively OUT
dealt OUT
a OUT
death OUT
blow OUT
to OUT
the OUT
Soviet Catch-MISC
empire OUT
and OUT
ended OUT
more OUT
than OUT
three OUT
centuries OUT
of OUT
rule OUT
from OUT
Moscow Catch-LOC
. OUT

Ukraine Catch-LOC
, OUT
with OUT
a OUT
Russian Catch-MISC
community OUT
of OUT
11 OUT
million OUT
people OUT
-- OUT
the OUT
world OUT
's OUT
largest OUT
outside OUT
Russia Catch-LOC
-- OUT
has OUT
avoided OUT
conflicts OUT
like OUT
those OUT
in OUT
Russia Catch-LOC
's OUT
Chechnya Catch-LOC
, OUT
neighbouring OUT
Moldova Catch-LOC
, OUT
and OUT
the OUT
former OUT
Soviet Catch-MISC
republics OUT
of OUT
Georgia Catch-LOC
, OUT
Azerbaijan Catch-LOC
and OUT
Tajikistan Catch-LOC
. OUT

" OUT
Ukraine Catch-LOC
's OUT
biggest OUT
achievements OUT
for OUT
five OUT
years OUT
are OUT
the OUT
preservation OUT
of OUT
civil OUT
peace OUT
and OUT
inter-ethnic OUT
harmony OUT
, OUT
" OUT
President OUT
Leonid Fusion
Kuchma Catch-PER
said OUT
in OUT
televised OUT
statement OUT
this OUT
week OUT
. OUT

" OUT
Unlike OUT
many OUT
other OUT
post-Soviet Catch-MISC
countries OUT
we OUT
were OUT
able OUT
to OUT
deal OUT
with OUT
conflict OUT
situations OUT
in OUT
a OUT
peaceful OUT
and OUT
civilised OUT
way OUT
. OUT
" OUT

But OUT
independence OUT
was OUT
initially OUT
accompanied OUT
by OUT
hyper-inflation OUT
and OUT
economic OUT
collapse OUT
, OUT
although OUT
there OUT
are OUT
signs OUT
of OUT
a OUT
turnaround OUT
. OUT

Inflation OUT
-- OUT
a OUT
hyper-inflationary OUT
10,300 OUT
percent OUT
a OUT
year OUT
in OUT
1993 OUT
-- OUT
was OUT
a OUT
respectable OUT
0.1 OUT
percent OUT
a OUT
month OUT
in OUT
June OUT
and OUT
July OUT
and OUT
the OUT
economy OUT
has OUT
just OUT
begun OUT
to OUT
grow OUT
. OUT

Kuchma Catch-PER
told OUT
a OUT
solemn OUT
ceremony OUT
at OUT
the OUT
Ukraina Fusion
Palace Catch-LOC
on OUT
Friday OUT
that OUT
" OUT
there OUT
was OUT
a OUT
turning OUT
point OUT
" OUT
in OUT
reforms OUT
and OUT
that OUT
he OUT
expected OUT
a OUT
rise OUT
in OUT
the OUT
standard OUT
of OUT
living OUT
in OUT
the OUT
near OUT
future OUT
. OUT

" OUT
There OUT
is OUT
no OUT
doubt OUT
that OUT
economic OUT
growth OUT
has OUT
already OUT
started OUT
, OUT
" OUT
said OUT
Adelbert Fusion
Knobl Catch-PER
, OUT
head OUT
of OUT
the OUT
International Fusion
Monetary Fusion
Fund Catch-ORG
's OUT
mission OUT
in OUT
Ukraine Catch-LOC
. OUT
" OUT

The OUT
national OUT
bank OUT
and OUT
the OUT
government OUT
have OUT
every OUT
reason OUT
to OUT
be OUT
proud OUT
of OUT
their OUT
efforts OUT
. OUT
" OUT

Central OUT
bank OUT
officials OUT
said OUT
on OUT
Thursday OUT
that OUT
a OUT
much-postponed OUT
hryvna OUT
currency OUT
would OUT
" OUT
definitely OUT
" OUT
be OUT
introduced OUT
before OUT
the OUT
end OUT
of OUT
this OUT
year OUT
. OUT

It OUT
will OUT
replace OUT
the OUT
interim OUT
karbovanets OUT
currency OUT
, OUT
which OUT
was OUT
introduced OUT
at OUT
par OUT
to OUT
the OUT
Russian Catch-MISC
rouble OUT
in OUT
1992 OUT
but OUT
now OUT
trades OUT
at OUT
almost OUT
33 OUT
karbovanets OUT
per OUT
rouble OUT
. OUT

Ukraine Catch-LOC
has OUT
repeatedly OUT
promised OUT
to OUT
introduce OUT
the OUT
hryvna OUT
but OUT
had OUT
to OUT
postpone OUT
the OUT
plans OUT
because OUT
of OUT
economic OUT
problems OUT
. OUT

Proud OUT
of OUT
its OUT
record OUT
in OUT
promptly OUT
joining OUT
both OUT
the OUT
Council Fusion
of Fusion
Europe Catch-ORG
and OUT
NATO Catch-ORG
's OUT
Partnership Fusion
for Fusion
Peace Catch-MISC
, OUT
Ukraine Catch-LOC
caused OUT
a OUT
foreign OUT
policy OUT
wrangle OUT
this OUT
week OUT
, OUT
offending OUT
China Catch-LOC
by OUT
allowing OUT
a OUT
Taiwanese Catch-MISC
minister OUT
to OUT
appear OUT
on OUT
a OUT
public OUT
, OUT
if OUT
unofficial OUT
visit OUT
. OUT

China Catch-LOC
cancelled OUT
a OUT
visit OUT
by OUT
a OUT
top-level OUT
delegation OUT
in OUT
protest OUT
. OUT

Kiev Catch-LOC
's OUT
Foreign OUT
Minister OUT
Hennady Fusion
Udovenko Catch-PER
said OUT
Beijing Catch-LOC
was OUT
overreacting OUT
. OUT

But OUT
Ukraine Catch-LOC
, OUT
seeing OUT
itself OUT
as OUT
a OUT
bridge OUT
between OUT

QUALIFIER OUT
. OUT

LISBON Catch-LOC
1996-08-23 OUT

new OUT
coach OUT
Artur Fusion

called OUT
up OUT
six OUT
players OUT
from OUT
league OUT
champions OUT
Porto Catch-ORG
on OUT
Friday OUT
in OUT
an OUT
18-man OUT
squad OUT
for OUT
the OUT
opening OUT
World Fusion
Cup Catch-MISC
qualifier OUT
against OUT
Armenia Catch-LOC
on OUT
August OUT
31 OUT
. OUT

Midfielder OUT
Paulo Fusion
Sousa Catch-PER
, OUT
recently OUT
transferred OUT
to OUT
Borussia Fusion
Dortmund Catch-ORG
from OUT
Italy Catch-LOC
's OUT
Juventus Catch-ORG
, OUT
is OUT
the OUT
only OUT
leading OUT
member OUT
of OUT
the OUT

side OUT
from OUT
this OUT
year OUT
's OUT
European Catch-MISC
championships OUT

will OUT
not OUT

trip OUT
. OUT

will OUT
be OUT

's OUT

. OUT

lent OUT

- OUT

AJAX Catch-ORG
SLUMP OUT
2-0 OUT
AT OUT
HEERENVEEN Catch-LOC
. OUT

AMSTERDAM Catch-LOC
1996-08-24 OUT

Dutch Catch-MISC
champions OUT
Ajax Fusion
Amsterdam Catch-ORG
faltered OUT
in OUT
their OUT
second OUT
league OUT
match OUT
of OUT
the OUT
season OUT
on OUT
Saturday OUT
losing OUT
2-0 OUT
away OUT
at OUT
Heerenveen Catch-ORG
. OUT

Ajax Catch-ORG
, OUT
who OUT
had OUT
a OUT
dismal OUT
series OUT
of OUT
pre-season OUT
results OUT
before OUT
beating OUT
NAC Catch-ORG
of OUT
Breda Catch-LOC
in OUT
their OUT
opening OUT
game OUT
, OUT
had OUT
the OUT
best OUT
of OUT
an OUT
entertaining OUT
first OUT
half OUT
but OUT
failed OUT
to OUT
break OUT
the OUT
deadlock OUT
. OUT

Eight OUT
minutes OUT
after OUT
the OUT
interval OUT
, OUT
Heerenveen Catch-ORG
's OUT
Romeo Fusion
Wouden Catch-PER
broke OUT
through OUT
the OUT
Amsterdam Catch-LOC
defence OUT

left OUT
defender OUT
John Fusion
Veldman Catch-PER
standing OUT
and OUT
curled OUT
the OUT

beyond OUT
goalkeeper OUT
Edwin Fusion
van Fusion
der Fusion
Sar Catch-PER
into OUT
the OUT
Ajax Catch-ORG
net OUT
. OUT

Ajax Catch-ORG

without OUT
injured OUT

Marcio Fusion

and OUT
Winston Fusion

and OUT
Marc Fusion

up OUT
the OUT
pace OUT

looked OUT
certain OUT
to OUT
equalise OUT
. OUT

But OUT
they OUT
left OUT
gaps OUT
at OUT
the OUT
back OUT
and OUT
on OUT
73 OUT
minutes OUT
Danish Catch-MISC
striker OUT
Jon Fusion
Dahl Fusion
Tomasson Catch-PER
rushed OUT
out OUT
of OUT
his OUT
own OUT
half OUT

the OUT
Ajax Catch-ORG

van Fusion
der Fusion

. OUT

A OUT

into OUT

during OUT

. OUT

Michael Fusion

, OUT

" OUT

seized OUT
Penrose Catch-PER
, OUT

from OUT

in OUT

( OUT

" OUT

Princess OUT
Diana Catch-PER
send OUT

Mother Fusion
Teresa Catch-PER
. OUT

LONDON Catch-LOC

GOLF OUT
- OUT
MICKELSON Catch-PER
WINS OUT
FOURTH OUT
TITLE OUT
OF OUT
YEAR OUT
IN OUT
AKRON Catch-LOC
. OUT

AKRON Catch-LOC
, OUT
Ohio Catch-LOC
1996-08-25 OUT

Phil Fusion
Mickelson Catch-PER
birdied OUT
two OUT
of OUT
the OUT
last OUT
three OUT
holes OUT
to OUT
win OUT
World Fusion
Series Fusion
of Fusion
Golf Catch-MISC
by OUT
three OUT
strokes OUT
over OUT
Billy Fusion
Mayfair Catch-PER
on OUT
Sunday OUT
. OUT

It OUT
was OUT
the OUT
fourth OUT
tournament OUT
title OUT
this OUT
year OUT
for OUT
Mickelson Catch-PER
, OUT
who OUT
shot OUT
an OUT
even-par OUT
70 OUT
, OUT
after OUT
being OUT
tied OUT
for OUT
the OUT
lead OUT
with OUT
Billy Fusion
Mayfair Catch-PER
with OUT
three OUT
holes OUT
to OUT
play OUT
. OUT

Along OUT
with OUT
Mayfiar Catch-PER
at OUT
277 OUT
for OUT
the OUT
tournament OUT
were OUT
Steve Fusion
Stricker Catch-PER
, OUT
who OUT
had OUT
a OUT
68 OUT
, OUT
and OUT
Duffy Fusion
Waldorf Catch-PER
, OUT
with OUT
a OUT
66 OUT
. OUT

" OUT
It OUT
was OUT
very OUT
hard OUT
to OUT
sleep OUT
last OUT
night OUT
because OUT
there OUT
was OUT
so OUT
much OUT
I OUT
could OUT
accomplish OUT
with OUT
this OUT
win OUT
, OUT
" OUT
said OUT
Mickelson Catch-PER
, OUT
who OUT
had OUT
a OUT
three-stroke OUT
lead OUT
entering OUT
the OUT
third OUT
round OUT
. OUT
" OUT

This OUT
was OUT
a OUT
win OUT
I OUT
wanted OUT
very OUT
, OUT
very OUT
much OUT
. OUT
" OUT

Mickelson Catch-PER
's OUT
victory OUT
gave OUT
him OUT
a OUT
10 OUT
year OUT
exemption OUT
to OUT
the OUT
PGA Fusion
Tour Catch-MISC
. OUT

The OUT
$ OUT
378,000 OUT
first OUT
place OUT
check OUT
brings OUT
Mickelson Catch-PER
back OUT
to OUT
the OUT
top OUT
of OUT
the OUT
money OUT
list OUT
with OUT
$ OUT
1,574,799 OUT
won OUT
this OUT
year OUT
. OUT

" OUT
This OUT
is OUT
a OUT
major OUT
championship OUT
golf OUT
course OUT
, OUT
and OUT
for OUT
me OUT
to OUT
perform OUT
well OUT
on OUT
this OUT
style OUT
of OUT
course OUT
is OUT
a OUT
big OUT
step OUT
up OUT
for OUT
me OUT
in OUT
my OUT
career OUT
and OUT
my OUT
performance OUT
in OUT
future OUT
majors OUT
, OUT
" OUT
he OUT
said OUT
. OUT

Mickelson Catch-PER
three-stroke OUT
lead OUT
was OUT
cut OUT
to OUT
two OUT
when OUT
Mayfair Catch-PER
birdied OUT
the OUT
course OUT
's OUT
only OUT
easy OUT
hole OUT
, OUT
the OUT
par OUT
five OUT
second OUT
hole OUT
, OUT
while OUT
Mickelson Catch-PER
three-putted OUT
for OUT
par OUT
from OUT
25 OUT
feet OUT
. OUT

On OUT
the OUT
back OUT
nine OUT
Mickelson Catch-PER
began OUT
driving OUT
erratically OUT
, OUT
and OUT
poor OUT
tee OUT
shots OUT
resulted OUT
in OUT
bogeys OUT
on OUT
the OUT
, OUT
eighth OUT
, OUT
12th OUT
and OUT
13th OUT
holes OUT
, OUT
bringing OUT
Mickelson Catch-PER
back OUT
to OUT
four OUT
under OUT
par OUT
, OUT
tied OUT
with OUT
Mayfair Catch-PER
, OUT
who OUT
had OUT
parred OUT
14 OUT
straight OUT
holes OUT
after OUT
the OUT
birdie OUT
on OUT
no.2 OUT
. OUT

Mickelson Catch-PER
then OUT
set OUT
up OUT
a OUT
tap OUT
in OUT
birdie OUT
on OUT
the OUT
16th OUT
, OUT
sending OUT
a OUT
wedge OUT
shot OUT
to OUT
18 OUT
inches OUT
. OUT

He OUT
had OUT
another OUT
birdie OUT
on OUT
the OUT
17th OUT
, OUT
where OUT
he OUT
his OUT
a OUT
6-iron OUT
to OUT
six OUT
feet OUT
. OUT

Mayfair Catch-PER
bogeyed OUT
the OUT
17th OUT
, OUT
missing OUT
a OUT
five OUT
foot OUT
par OUT
putt OUT
, OUT
and OUT
dropped OUT
from OUT
solo OUT
second OUT
place OUT
to OUT
a OUT
three OUT
way OUT
tie OUT
for OUT
second OUT
. OUT

It OUT
was OUT
the OUT
second OUT

year OUT
in OUT
which OUT
Mayfair Catch-PER
has OUT
finished OUT
runner OUT
up OUT
in OUT
this OUT

. OUT

Greg Fusion
Norman Catch-PER
in OUT
sudden OUT

last OUT

, OUT

he OUT
bogeyed OUT

13th OUT
and OUT
14th OUT
holes OUT
. OUT

. OUT

, OUT

in OUT

Andrea Fusion
Ferrigato Catch-PER
of OUT

sprinted OUT
to OUT
his OUT

Cup Catch-MISC

in OUT

with OUT

in OUT

's OUT

of OUT

. OUT

twice OUT

as OUT

1996-08-25 OUT

soccer OUT

has OUT

to OUT

his OUT

agency OUT

, OUT
35 OUT

would OUT
no OUT
longer OUT

available OUT
for OUT

for OUT

to OUT

left OUT
a OUT

championship OUT

were OUT

to OUT

de Fusion

on OUT

. OUT

, OUT

eco-terrorism OUT
we OUT
are OUT
looking OUT
at OUT
controversial OUT
jobs OUT
more OUT
closely OUT
to OUT
see OUT
if OUT
the OUT
profit OUT
margins OUT
are OUT
wide OUT
enough OUT
to OUT
cover OUT
things OUT
like OUT
extra OUT
security OUT
. OUT
" OUT

For OUT
an OUT
industry OUT
already OUT
suffering OUT
from OUT
razor-thin OUT
margins OUT
, OUT
overcapacity OUT
and OUT
stagnant OUT
demand OUT
, OUT
eco-terrorism OUT
is OUT
the OUT
latest OUT
bizarre OUT
twist OUT
in OUT
the OUT
construction OUT
sector OUT
's OUT
tale OUT
of OUT
woe OUT
. OUT

London Fusion
Carnival Catch-MISC
ends OUT
in OUT
high OUT
spirits OUT
. OUT

LONDON Catch-LOC
1996-08-26 OUT

London Catch-LOC
's OUT
annual OUT
Notting Fusion
Hill Fusion
Carnival Catch-MISC
, OUT
the OUT
largest OUT
in OUT
Europe Catch-LOC
and OUT
second OUT
in OUT
the OUT
world OUT
only OUT
to OUT
Rio Catch-LOC
, OUT
ended OUT
peacefully OUT
on OUT
Monday OUT
with OUT
an OUT
estimated OUT
800,000 OUT
revellers OUT
singing OUT
and OUT
dancing OUT
the OUT
day OUT
away OUT
in OUT
high OUT
spirits OUT
. OUT

Police OUT
said OUT
they OUT
made OUT
30 OUT
arrests OUT
and OUT
there OUT
were OUT
two OUT
stabbings OUT
. OUT

But OUT
there OUT
was OUT
no OUT
repeat OUT
of OUT
the OUT
ugly OUT
scenes OUT
that OUT
used OUT
to OUT
scar OUT
the OUT
street OUT
festival OUT
, OUT
and OUT
police OUT
praised OUT
the OUT

over OUT

as OUT

. OUT

Around OUT

were OUT
wounded OUT
in OUT

in OUT
1976 OUT
when OUT
the OUT
carnival OUT
, OUT
now OUT
in OUT

acquired OUT
its OUT

reputation OUT
from OUT
which OUT

is OUT
now OUT
only OUT
slowly OUT

. OUT

Shopkeepers OUT
still OUT
board OUT

their OUT
windows OUT
and OUT
many OUT

leave OUT
town OUT
for OUT
the OUT
weekend OUT
, OUT
but OUT
for OUT
four OUT

there OUT
has OUT
been OUT
no OUT

relatively OUT
little OUT

. OUT

, OUT

. OUT

took OUT

after OUT
five OUT

of OUT

. OUT

to OUT

which OUT

SEC Catch-ORG
adopts OUT
rules OUT
to OUT
improve OUT
investor OUT
access OUT
to OUT
best OUT
stock OUT
prices OUT
. OUT

WASHINGTON Catch-LOC
1996-08-28 OUT

The OUT
Securities Fusion
and Fusion
Exchange Fusion
Commission Catch-ORG
Wednesday OUT
approved OUT
rules OUT
designed OUT
to OUT
give OUT
stock OUT
market OUT
investors OUT
a OUT
better OUT
chance OUT
at OUT
getting OUT
the OUT
best OUT
price OUT
available OUT
for OUT
their OUT
orders OUT
. OUT

The OUT
so-called OUT
order OUT
handling OUT
rules OUT
, OUT
which OUT
were OUT
proposed OUT
last OUT
September OUT
, OUT
were OUT
approved OUT
in OUT
a OUT
4-0 OUT
vote OUT
. OUT

The OUT
new OUT
rules OUT
will OUT
require OUT
specialists OUT
at OUT
stock OUT
exchanges OUT
and OUT
market OUT
makers OUT
on OUT
Nasdaq Catch-MISC
to OUT
allow OUT
customers OUT
to OUT
view OUT
price OUT
quotes OUT
from OUT
other OUT
electronic OUT
trading OUT
systems OUT
that OUT
may OUT
not OUT
be OUT
readily OUT
available OUT
to OUT
them OUT
. OUT

The OUT
rules OUT
will OUT
also OUT
require OUT
that OUT
customer OUT
limit OUT
orders OUT
be OUT
displayed OUT
with OUT
prices OUT
better OUT
than OUT
those OUT
available OUT
in OUT
quotes OUT
publicly OUT
available OUT
at OUT
the OUT
time OUT
. OUT

Specialists OUT
and OUT
market OUT
makers OUT
are OUT
companies OUT
or OUT
individuals OUT
recognised OUT
as OUT
qualified OUT
to OUT
maintain OUT
an OUT
orderly OUT
market OUT
in OUT
a OUT
stock OUT
. OUT

In OUT
a OUT
limit OUT
order OUT
, OUT
investors OUT
specify OUT
the OUT
price OUT
at OUT
which OUT
they OUT
are OUT
willing OUT
to OUT
buy OUT
or OUT
sell OUT
, OUT
as OUT
opposed OUT
to OUT
a OUT
market OUT
order OUT
executed OUT
at OUT
prevailing OUT
prices OUT
. OUT

" OUT
These OUT
rules OUT
are OUT
intended OUT
to OUT
empower OUT
all OUT
investors OUT
, OUT
by OUT
allowing OUT
their OUT
orders OUT
to OUT
compete OUT
on OUT
a OUT
level OUT
playing OUT
field OUT
, OUT
and OUT
by OUT
providing OUT
the OUT
disclosure OUT
they OUT
need OUT
to OUT
make OUT
informed OUT
decisions OUT
, OUT
" OUT
said OUT
SEC Catch-ORG
Chairman OUT
Arthur Fusion
Levitt Catch-PER
. OUT

The OUT
SEC Catch-ORG
's OUT
goal OUT
, OUT
he OUT
added OUT
, OUT
was OUT
to OUT
create OUT
" OUT
one OUT
system OUT
where OUT
one OUT
price OUT
could OUT
be OUT
available OUT
to OUT
everybody OUT
. OUT
" OUT

The OUT
director OUT
of OUT
the OUT
SEC Catch-ORG
's OUT
division OUT
of OUT
market OUT
regulation OUT
, OUT
Richard Fusion
Lindsey Catch-PER
, OUT
said OUT
Wall Fusion
Street Catch-LOC
firms OUT
will OUT
probably OUT
need OUT
to OUT
spend OUT
about OUT
$ OUT
7 OUT
million OUT
to OUT
carry OUT
out OUT
the OUT
improvements OUT
called OUT
for OUT
by OUT
the OUT
new OUT
rules OUT
. OUT

In OUT
proposing OUT
the OUT
rules OUT
last OUT
year OUT
, OUT
the OUT
SEC Catch-ORG
noted OUT
that OUT
while OUT
technology OUT
has OUT
improved OUT
, OUT
commonplace OUT
practices OUT
still OUT
existed OUT
that OUT
worked OUT
against OUT
investors OUT
' OUT
best OUT
interests OUT
. OUT

It OUT
noted OUT
that OUT
customers OUT
whose OUT
orders OUT
were OUT
not OUT
displayed OUT
lost OUT
the OUT
chance OUT
of OUT
getting OUT
the OUT
best OUT
possible OUT
price OUT
available OUT
in OUT
the OUT
market OUT
. OUT

It OUT
also OUT
cited OUT
the OUT
potential OUT
problem OUT
of OUT
a OUT
two-tiered OUT
market OUT
in OUT
which OUT
market OUT
makers OUT
quote OUT
one OUT
price OUT
to OUT
public OUT
investors OUT
while OUT
quoting OUT
better OUT
prices OUT
in OUT
private OUT
systems OUT
, OUT
thus OUT
robbing OUT
investors OUT
without OUT
access OUT
to OUT
" OUT
hidden OUT
" OUT
quotes OUT
the OUT
benefit OUT
of OUT
the OUT
best OUT
available OUT
prices OUT
. OUT

Earlier OUT
this OUT
month OUT
, OUT
the OUT
SEC Catch-ORG
settled OUT
charges OUT
of OUT
alleged OUT
malpractices OUT
on OUT
Nasdaq Catch-MISC
when OUT
the OUT
parent OUT
of OUT
the OUT

market OUT
, OUT

Association Fusion
of Fusion

Dealers Catch-ORG

over OUT

years OUT
to OUT
upgrade OUT
its OUT

of OUT

' OUT

practices OUT
. OUT

The OUT
SEC Catch-ORG
dropped OUT
a OUT
third OUT
proposal OUT
that OUT
would OUT
have OUT

with OUT

to OUT

a OUT

if OUT
there OUT
were OUT
shifts OUT
in OUT
prices OUT

. OUT

The OUT

of OUT

" OUT

" OUT

. OUT

The OUT

that OUT
would OUT

continuous OUT
" OUT

" OUT

" OUT

" OUT

Martin Fusion
Ayres Catch-PER

MANCHESTER Catch-LOC
, OUT
England Catch-LOC
1996-08-28 OUT

Britain Catch-LOC
's OUT
Chris Fusion
Boardman Catch-PER
fulfilled OUT
his OUT
prediction OUT
that OUT
he OUT
would OUT
break OUT
the OUT
world OUT
4,000 OUT
metres OUT
world OUT
record OUT
in OUT
the OUT
world OUT
track OUT
cycling OUT
championships OUT
on OUT
Wednesday OUT
. OUT

Boardman Catch-PER
clocked OUT
four OUT
minutes OUT
13.353 OUT
seconds OUT
to OUT
slice OUT
more OUT
than OUT
six OUT
seconds OUT
from OUT
the OUT
previous OUT
world OUT
mark OUT
of OUT
4:19.699 OUT
set OUT
by OUT
Olympic Catch-MISC
champion OUT
Andrea Fusion
Collinelli Catch-PER
of OUT
Italy Catch-LOC
in OUT
Atlanta Catch-LOC
in OUT
July OUT
. OUT

Collinelli Catch-PER
qualified OUT
in OUT
second OUT
place OUT
, OUT
also OUT
beating OUT
his OUT
old OUT
record OUT
in OUT
4:17.696 OUT
. OUT

" OUT
I OUT
was OUT
very OUT
nervous OUT
before OUT
the OUT
start OUT
but OUT
then OUT
I OUT
was OUT
amazed OUT
by OUT
the OUT
speed OUT
of OUT
my OUT
ride OUT
, OUT
" OUT
Boardman Catch-PER
said OUT
. OUT
" OUT

I OUT
do OUT
n't OUT
know OUT
if OUT
I OUT
can OUT
go OUT
any OUT
faster OUT
. OUT

Who OUT
knows OUT
what OUT
will OUT
happen OUT
in OUT
the OUT
later OUT
stages OUT
? OUT
" OUT

Boardman Catch-PER
, OUT
28 OUT
, OUT
did OUT
not OUT
contest OUT
the OUT
Olympic Catch-MISC
pursuit OUT
because OUT
of OUT
its OUT
proximity OUT
to OUT
the OUT
Tour Fusion
de Fusion
France Catch-MISC
in OUT
which OUT
he OUT
led OUT
the OUT
French Catch-MISC
GAN Catch-ORG
team OUT
. OUT

However OUT
, OUT
he OUT
took OUT
a OUT
bronze OUT
medal OUT
in OUT
the OUT
Olympic Catch-MISC
road OUT
time-trial OUT
and OUT
then OUT
returned OUT
home OUT
to OUT
prepare OUT
for OUT
the OUT
world OUT
track OUT
series OUT
in OUT
the OUT
Manchester Catch-LOC
indoor OUT
velodrome OUT
. OUT

He OUT
adopted OUT
the OUT
" OUT
superman OUT
" OUT
riding OUT
position OUT
with OUT
arms OUT
at OUT
full OUT
stretch OUT
perfected OUT
by OUT
fellow OUT
Briton Catch-MISC
Graeme Fusion
Obree Catch-PER
, OUT
the OUT
1995 OUT
world OUT
champion OUT
, OUT
and OUT
taken OUT
up OUT
in OUT
Atlanta Catch-LOC
by OUT
Collinelli Catch-PER
. OUT

Obree Catch-PER
was OUT
forced OUT
to OUT
pull OUT
out OUT
of OUT
his OUT
title OUT
defence OUT
because OUT
of OUT

viral OUT
infection OUT

BASEBALL OUT
- OUT

CHICAGO Catch-LOC
1996-08-27 OUT

Cubs Catch-ORG

1996-08-28 OUT

in OUT

the OUT

on OUT

as OUT

of OUT
the OUT

's OUT

of OUT

. OUT

Thousands OUT

Researchers OUT
report OUT
progress OUT
in OUT
muscular OUT
dystrophy OUT
. OUT

PHILADELPHIA Catch-LOC
1996-08-29 OUT

University Fusion
of Fusion
Pennsylvania Catch-ORG
researchers OUT
on OUT
Thursday OUT
said OUT
a OUT
new OUT
gene-therapy OUT
technique OUT
for OUT
treating OUT
muscular OUT
dystrophy OUT
disease OUT
had OUT
shown OUT
progress OUT
in OUT
laboratory OUT
animals OUT
. OUT

Word OUT
of OUT
the OUT
findings OUT
, OUT
to OUT
be OUT
published OUT
in OUT
the OUT
Oct. OUT
1 OUT
issue OUT
of OUT
the OUT
journal OUT
" OUT
Human Fusion
Gene Fusion
Therapy Catch-ORG
, OUT
" OUT
came OUT
in OUT
advance OUT
of OUT
the OUT
annual OUT
Jerry Fusion
Lewis Fusion
Labour Fusion
Day Catch-MISC
weekend OUT
telethon OUT
to OUT
raise OUT
money OUT
for OUT
muscular OUT
dystrophy OUT
research OUT
. OUT

Several OUT
hurdles OUT
must OUT
be OUT
overcome OUT
before OUT
the OUT
method OUT
is OUT
used OUT
in OUT
human OUT
trials OUT
. OUT

Nevertheless OUT
, OUT
" OUT
a OUT
treatment OUT
based OUT
on OUT
the OUT
new OUT
strategy OUT
.... OUT
may OUT
have OUT
the OUT
potential OUT
to OUT
benefit OUT
many OUT
patients OUT
, OUT
" OUT
the OUT
University Fusion
of Fusion
Pennsylvania Catch-ORG
Medical OUT
Centre OUT
said OUT
in OUT
a OUT
release OUT
. OUT

Muscular OUT
dystrophy OUT
is OUT
a OUT
fatal OUT
illness OUT
in OUT
which OUT
the OUT
body OUT
's OUT
muscle OUT
tissue OUT
degenerates OUT
and OUT
is OUT
replaced OUT
by OUT
fat OUT
. OUT

Death OUT
strikes OUT
in OUT
early OUT
adulthood OUT
. OUT

Individuals OUT
with OUT
the OUT
disease OUT
have OUT
a OUT
non-working OUT
version OUT
of OUT
a OUT
gene OUT
responsible OUT
for OUT
producing OUT
a OUT
crucial OUT
muscle OUT
protein OUT
called OUT
dystrophin OUT
. OUT

In OUT
the OUT
study OUT
at OUT
the OUT
University OUT
's OUT
Institute Fusion
for Fusion
Human Fusion
Gene Fusion
Therapy Catch-ORG
, OUT
researchers OUT
altered OUT
a OUT
common-cold OUT
virus OUT
to OUT
carry OUT
a OUT
version OUT
of OUT
the OUT
working OUT
dystrophin OUT
gene OUT
. OUT

The OUT
virus OUT
, OUT
which OUT
also OUT
was OUT
altered OUT
to OUT
minimise OUT
its OUT
susceptibility OUT
to OUT
the OUT
immune OUT
system OUT
, OUT
was OUT
then OUT
injected OUT
into OUT
the OUT
muscle OUT
cells OUT
of OUT
mice OUT
bred OUT
to OUT
lack OUT
dystrophin OUT
genes OUT
. OUT

In OUT
the OUT
experiment OUT
, OUT
between OUT
30 OUT
to OUT
40 OUT
percent OUT
of OUT
the OUT
muscle OUT
fibers OUT
in OUT
one OUT
group OUT
of OUT
mice OUT
produced OUT
dystrophin OUT
for OUT
two OUT
weeks OUT
before OUT
diminishing OUT
. OUT

Similar OUT
results OUT
had OUT
been OUT
obtained OUT
previously OUT
in OUT
test-tube OUT
cell OUT
cultures OUT
, OUT
but OUT
not OUT
in OUT
live OUT
animals OUT
, OUT
the OUT
university OUT
said OUT
. OUT

The OUT
university OUT
said OUT
methods OUT
are OUT
still OUT
needed OUT
to OUT
make OUT
enough OUT
of OUT
the OUT
altered OUT
virus OUT
to OUT
treat OUT
humans OUT
, OUT
to OUT
further OUT
decrease OUT
the OUT
immune-system OUT
response OUT
to OUT
the OUT
virus OUT
, OUT
and OUT
to OUT
deliver OUT
the OUT
virus OUT
to OUT
human OUT
muscle OUT
tissue OUT
. OUT

" OUT
